<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Pain](/Feats.aspx?ID=2421) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 51 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7); [Orc Warmask](/Feats.aspx?ID=2415)

**Trigger**
You succeed at a [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) check.

**Requirements**
You're wearing your _warmask_.

</column>

---

Your mask has grown into a manifestation of your pain, which you can release. The creature you successfully Demoralized takes 2d6 mental damage, or 4d6 mental damage if you're legendary in Intimidation. The target is then temporarily immune to additional damage from Mask of Pain for 24 hours.
name: Mask of Pain
